title: AI-Driven Threat Detection Task Force
objective: To develop and implement advanced AI-driven systems for detecting and countering AI-enhanced phishing attacks, thereby improving organizational cybersecurity.
timeline_phases: Phase 1: Project Kickoff and Team Formation
kpis: Reduction in phishing incident response time
Increase in detection rate of phishing attempts
User awareness and training completion rate
Feedback from security audits and assessments
risks: Insufficient data for training AI models
Potential for evolving phishing techniques outpacing detection capabilities
